name: homebridge-grumptech-volmon
description: Free Space monitor for mounted volumes.

remarks: The 'plugin' and 'platform' names MUST match the names called out in the 'platforms' section of the active config.json file.
If these values are changed, the module will need to be rebuilt. Run 'npm run build'.

scripts.prepare: npm run docs; npm run build
scripts.docs: docDir='./docs'; [[ -e "$docDir" ]] && rm -rf "$docDir/"*; cp ./security.md ./pages/; wait; cp ./license.md ./pages/; wait; npx jsdoc -c ./jsdoc.conf.json --destination "$docDir/"
scripts.docs-dev: docDir='./docs-dev'; [[ -e "$docDir" ]] && rm -rf "$docDir/"*; cp ./security.md ./pages/; cp ./license.md ./pages/; npx jsdoc -c ./jsdoc.conf.json --destination "$docDir/" --private

author: GrumpTech (Michael J. Price)
